CustomField.description: Message to display when a quiz taker fails the quiz.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the message to be displayed when a quiz taker fails the quiz. This message is shown to participants who do not meet the passing score or criteria set for the quiz. It can provide encouragement, guidance, or any other relevant information to motivate the quiz taker to retake the quiz and improve their performance.
CustomField.label: Retake Message
